Home Professional HomeLab Building a Community Bike Music Artsy Travel Arch Masters Tribute Page

In 2020 I started creating content on Twitch as a hobby, and I successfully built a growing community around: (as of 2021)

  • Twitch affiliate channel with 538 followers & 19 subscribers.
  • Discord server with 224 people
  • YouTube channel with many subs

Maybe not the greatest numbers out there, but I'm proud nonetheless :)

The types of content I make include teaching programming to beginners, StarCraft II gameplay/analysis/improvement, and live game development for fun. Below you can find some highlights and links to my content (mostly in Turkish).


Here are some of the videos on my channel:

In this video I'm writing the same program (binary search) in C++, Python and Racket, showing beginners that there isn’t much difference at the start. Title: "Start Programming! Doesn't matter which language, start today, start now!"

Introducing Object-Oriented Programming to beginners.

I like casting professional StarCraft II games every once in a while :)
